Selecting a treatment sequences

Chosing arms in a treatment sequence

print(iviRA::therapy.pars$info)
##                                   name        mname    sname biologic
##  1:                            cDMARDs      cDMARDs  cdmards        0
##  2:        abatacept IV + methotrexate ABT IV + MTX abtivmtx        1
##  3:          adalimumab + methotrexate    ADA + MTX   adamtx        1
##  4:                         adalimumab          ADA      ada        1
##  5:          etanercept + methotrexate    ETN + MTX   etnmtx        1
##  6:                         etanercept          ETN      etn        1
##  7:           golimumab + methotrexate    GOL + MTX   golmtx        1
##  8:          infliximab + methotrexate    IFX + MTX   ifxmtx        1
##  9:                            placebo      Placebo  placebo        0
## 10:         tocilizumab + methotrexate    TCZ + MTX   tczmtx        1
## 11:                        tocilizumab          TCZ      tcz        1
## 12:  certolizumab pegol + methotrexate    CZP + MTX   czpmtx        1
## 13:        abatacept SC + methotrexate ABT SC + MTX abtscmtx        1
## 14:                       non-biologic          NBT      nbt        0
## 15:           rituximab + methotrexate    RTX + MTX   rtxmtx        1
## 16: tofacitinib citrate + methotrexate    TOF + MTX   tofmtx        1
## 17:                          rituximab          RTX      rtx        1
## 18:                tofacitinib citrate          TOF      tof        1
## 19:                 certolizumab pegol          CZP      czp        1
## 20:                          golimumab          GOL      gol        1
arm1 <- c("cdmards")
arm2 <- c("adamtx", "etnmtx", "ifxmtx")
arm2.mat <- matrix(c("adamtx", "etnmtx", "ifxmtx", "etnmtx", "adamtx", "ifxmtx"), 
                     nrow = nrow(pop), ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
head(arm2.mat)
##      [,1]     [,2]     [,3]    
## [1,] "adamtx" "etnmtx" "ifxmtx"
## [2,] "etnmtx" "adamtx" "ifxmtx"
## [3,] "adamtx" "etnmtx" "ifxmtx"
## [4,] "etnmtx" "adamtx" "ifxmtx"
## [5,] "adamtx" "etnmtx" "ifxmtx"
## [6,] "etnmtx" "adamtx" "ifxmtx"
